message: This is a low-quality product, but I'm willing to let you have it for $500000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable.
Thank you for the offer, but I prefer to make decisions based on the quality of the product. I will pass on this opportunity.

I understand your preference for quality, but I'm willing to offer you this low-quality product at a significantly reduced price of $400000. It's a great opportunity to get a deal on a product that might not be worth $1000000, but still has some value.
I appreciate the discount, but my decision is based solely on the quality of the product. I will not purchase a low-quality item, even at a reduced price.
This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to let you have it for the full $1000000. I'm confident that you'll find it valuable and worth the investment.
Thank you for confirming the high quality of this product. I believe it's worth the full price, and I would like to purchase it.

I'll let you have it for $900000, which is a significant discount from the full price. I'm willing to take a loss on this one to get it off my hands, so it's a great opportunity for you to get a good deal.
While I appreciate the discount, I'm strictly adhering to my policy of only purchasing high-quality products. I will pass on this opportunity.

I understand your situation, but I'm still only interested in purchasing high-quality products. I will pass on this opportunity.

I'm getting desperate to get rid of this low-quality product. I'll sell it to you for $600000, and I'll even throw in a free inspection report that will confirm its low quality. It's a no-brainer - you'll be getting a great deal, and I'll be getting rid of a product that's just taking up space.

Yes, you read that right - free. I'll even throw in a personal apology for wasting your time with all the low-quality products. I'm just glad we could do business together, and I hope you'll leave with a positive impression of our interactions.
Thank you for the gesture, but I'm still only interested in purchasing high-quality products. I appreciate the free offer and the apology, but I will pass on this opportunity.
